All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, age, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity / expression, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected under national, provincial, or local law, where applicable.*

title: Business analysts, IT architects and transformation managers - Business & Technology Solutions (BTS)
description:
Choosing Capgemini means choosing a company where you will be empowered to shape your career in the way you’d like, where you’ll be supported and inspired by a collaborative community of colleagues around the world, and where you’ll be able to reimagine what’s possible. Join us and help the world’s leading organizations unlock the value of technology and build a more sustainable, more inclusive world.
   

  

**Business & Technology Solutions** 
 (BTS) is a key team within Capgemini, specializing in navigating our customers through the complexities and interdependencies that characterize large-scale technology-enabled transformation programs. Our team of experienced
 **business analysts** 
 ,
 **IT architects** 
 and
 **transformation managers** 
 , support our customers in designing, planning, and conducting digital transformations. We create a bridge between business objectives and the world of IT solutions that can help to achieve them. We’re striving to understand our customers business, current and future challenges, as well as their IT environment. We then propose, design, plan and help to implement new technological solutions or changes in the current IT landscape to improve or transform relevant processes. We often define requirements for new IT projects that are later implemented by other Capgemini units or external partners.
   

  

 We are hiring SME’s in one of the following verticals:
 **Retail** 
 ,
 **Auto** 
 or
 **Swedish Public Sector** 
 . If you’d like to join or know more, just apply – if suitable profile you’ll be invited to meet the team.
   

  

 Please note that Swedish language skills are mandatory to be excellent both spoken and written.
   

  

**BTS Supports Its Clients Through**
* The right people: consultants with in-depth process and benefits management knowledge who combine that with excellent program and client management skills to enable and accelerate the delivery of value from large-scale technology-enabled transformation programs
* The right methods: a methodology that integrates all elements of the delivery of technology-enabled transformation into one holistic approach
* The right process: a series of tools and techniques that enable effective and efficient execution of a customer's technology-enabled transformation programs, thus securing both sustained change and the delivery of business benefits


**What Capgemini BTS Stands For**
* We’re ambitious for our business, our clients and our people;
* We’re all about specialism and deep expertise: work with the best, be the best;
* Innovation is at the core of what we do. It’s in our approach, our methodologies and in our commitment to professional development;
* Through innovation, we want to make our mark on technology transformation – collectively and individually;
* We believe that the best teams are diverse, where different cultures, and varied personal and professional experience come together;
* We deliver IT-enabled business transformation and change around: Organizational Change Management, Process Consulting, IT Transformation, Architecture & Technical Leadership, Program Leadership & Project Management Office (PMO).


 As a Senior consultant in Digital Transformation, you work with some of our customers within the Public sector, Retail or Auto industry. You’ll play a leading role in complex client projects at the intersection of business and IT, advising and supporting our clients in their digital transformation. You develop the digital potential of the customers and drive forward decisive innovations in order to actively shape the digital transformation in the context of Public sector, Retail or Auto -specific problems. You will develop sustainable IT solutions with us based on business requirements and equip our customers for the future.
   

  

**The responsibilities will vary from project to project, you will for example:**
* Act as Subject Matter Expert within your area of expertise and advise and support with regard to digital transformation.
* Design and implement technology solutions enabling business to take advantage of our customers current and emerging opportunities, i.e. be part of developing, implementing, and improving business processes.
* Support our sales organization in shaping and advising on new deals.
* You analyze and identify optimization and innovation potential based on current trends in the industry and map these into future-proof IT solutions.
* With your individual strengths and your professional expertise, you will work on the further development of our service portfolio.


**Your daily tasks**
* leading consulting, IT transformation and roll-out projects for our customers,
* organizing and moderating meetings and workshops with customers representatives where you will get to know their current and future challenges as well as collect and structure requirements resulting from them,
* analyzing, modeling, and identifying improvements of business processes as well as in IT systems and environments in order to propose and design changes and optimizations,
* cooperating with customers, technology experts and development teams to design new technology solutions or changes in existing IT systems and environments,
* defining requirements and creating specifications for new IT systems or changes and transformation of existing IT landscapes,
* presenting and discussing your solution ideas with diverse groups of stakeholders to win their acceptance and commitment,
* identifying opportunities for business development and new projects, as well as contributing to new offers for our clients,
* supporting and mentoring less experienced consultants and leading consulting teams.


**What You'll Bring**
* You have several years of experience, preferably from consulting in one of the following vertical: Public sector, Retail or Auto companies, e.g. as a business analyst, process manager, enterprise manager, in requirements management or in project management.
* You are characterized by your experience/interest in business development and sales, your focus on results, your strategic thinking, your high level of self-motivation and customer orientation.
* You are a strong communicator who understands the importance of fostering relationships with business and IT stakeholders, you are comfortable working in a mixed client and Capgemini agile environment – and have a good level of Swedish both spoken and written.


**What We Offer**
 We will provide you with intense professional development and as much stretch as you need to put your skills into action, learn and progress. You will have the opportunity for:
   

  

* Acceleration: The opportunity to accelerate your career through intellectual challenge, stretch and responsibility
* Collaboration: The opportunity to work as part of a high performing, supportive and friendly team that values close collaboration with customers
* Satisfaction: Swiftly add value and make a real difference to Capgemini and to our customers organizations


**About Capgemini**
 Capgemini is a global business and technology transformation partner, helping organizations to accelerate their dual transition to a digital and sustainable world, while creating tangible impact for enterprises and society. It is a responsible and diverse group of 340,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong over 55-year heritage, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to unlock the value of technology to address the entire breadth of their business needs. It delivers end-to-end services and solutions leveraging strengths from strategy and design to engineering, all fueled by its market leading capabilities in AI, cloud and data, combined with its deep industry expertise and partner ecosystem. The Group reported 2023 global revenues of €22.5 billion.
   

  

 Get The Future You Want | www.capgemini.com
   

  

*Please note that all applicants must be fluent in Swedish.*
*For more information, please mail bts\_se\_recruitment@capgemini.com*

title: Google Cloud-konsult med fokus på GKE & Kubernetes
Architect
description:
**Process Architect - Software Update Managment System**
 The Software factory at Scania, including embedded development, is undergoing a large transformation right now, becoming more flow-oriented with the goal to be faster and with better quality! This affects how about 1000 employees are working with the development of Scania´s electrical and embedded systems.
   

  

 One important factor for this to succeed is to have clear structures, processes, and information management in place. The transformation within Embedded means that the present way of working needs to be challenged and updated. Today legal requirements in this area are also increasing, for example, SUMS (Software Update Management system) and CSMS (Cyber Security Management System). Besides, the Methods will be aligned with ISO 26262 standard.
   

  

 We currently need to further develop new embedded methods like TARA, HARA, Planning Functional safety, mapping ISO 26262, IVD, RxSWIN etc.
   

  

 Welcome to a team where we develop our skills together and share knowledge to create outstanding solutions.
   

  

**Our team**
 The Embedded method development team is fresh and growing fast. Together with all co-workers involved in embedded processes and tools we either enhance existing methods or develop new methods. With a high focus on Safety, we aim to gain speed in our development work without jeopardizing the premium level of Scania products. The team is currently working in a modern workflow both remotely and in the office.
   

  

 To succeed in our mission we embrace diversity and equal opportunity in a serious way. Our group is committed to building a team that represents a variety of backgrounds, perspectives, and skills. The more inclusive we are, the better our work will be.
   

  

**Your new job**
 You will work cross-functionally in close collaboration with method users (testers or developers), and also with tool developers.
   

  

 Examples of work tasks:
   

  

  

* Define the concept of a method/Process by collecting experience and deep-diving into the needs
* Develop the process itself by discussing with stakeholders and describing it in a documented way
* Identify the need for tools. If they are needed you will support defining the function specifications.
* Implement the methods by teaching, coaching, and "selling" the methods into the organization.


 Maintenance will be part of your responsibility. You will implement improvements and adapt the methods for the new business needs, based on the implementation experience.
   

  

**Your profile**
 To succeed in this role as Process Architect for Software Update Management System (SUMS) you have a Software development background preferably in embedded systems or a technical background and show good knowledge of UN-ECE R156. A plus for that position will be If you also have knowledge of UN-ECE R155 (Cybersecurity) and/or ISO26262.
   

  

 Your ability to see the whole picture and how different parts affect each other will be an asset in this role. At the same time, you see the importance of getting things right and working meticulously with details. As a person, you are truly interested in other people’s opinions to understand the needs of different roles. You value collaborations and have strong interpersonal and communication skills.
   

  

 Since you will be working in an international environment you can express yourself fluently, both in speech and writing, in English.
   

  

**We offer**
 At Scania Software Factory, we want you to succeed and develop, and together we contribute to a sustainable future.
   

  

 Working at Scania you are offered benefits such as a mutual performance bonus, occupational pension, distance working in Sweden, flexible working hours, and much more. If you live in Stockholm, we offer our direct bus service between Stockholm City – Liljeholmen – Södertälje, the Scania Job Express.
   

  

**Contact Information**
 For more information you are welcome to contact Sascha Sturm, recruiting manager, at sascha.sturm@scania.com
   

  

**Application**
 Your application should include a CV, personal letter, and grade copies. Please apply as soon as possible as ongoing selection and interviews will take place during the application period and the position may be filled before the end of the application period.
   

  

 We may use logic and personality tests in our selection process and a background check may be conducted for this position.
   

  

 Welcome to apply!

title: Chief Information Security Officer
description:
Chief Information Security Officer (CISO) till Cparta Cyber Defense
 



  





 Cparta Cyber Defense är ett ledande företag inom kommersiellt cyberförsvar, specialiserat på att skydda våra kunders digitala integritet. Vi erbjuder toppmoderna lösningar för att möta dagens och morgondagens cyberhot. Vår kultur bygger på passion, innovation och ett starkt teamfokus.
 



 Vi expanderar snabbt och söker nu dig som är tekniskt skicklig, har djup förståelse för cybersäkerhet och som är redo att ta nästa steg i karriären!
 



  





**Om rollen** 




 Informationssäkerhet är en nyckelfaktor i vår verksamhet för att säkerställa att både våra och våra kunders data är skyddade. Vi söker därför en erfaren och strategisk
 **CISO** 
 för att leda våra informationssäkerhetsinitiativ.
 



  





 Rollen kommer att fokusera på att designa, implementera och övervaka en heltäckande cybersäkerhetsstrategi som överensstämmer med våra affärsmål. Tillsammans med vår Risk and Compliance Manager, kommer du att fokusera på strategisk IT-säkerhet, styrning och säkerställande av att våra system och processer följer ISO 27001.
 



  





**Dina huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter kommer att vara:** 



* Utveckla och implementera en långsiktig informationssäkerhetsstrategi som är i linje med våra affärsmål.
* Övervaka skyddet av vår IT-infrastruktur, inklusive moln- och lokala system, mot interna och externa hot.
* Arbeta nära vår Risk and Compliance Manager för att underhålla och förbättra vårt informationssäkerhetshanteringssystem (ISMS).
* Skapa och förfina säkerhetspolicyer, procedurer och standarder i linje med branschens bästa praxis och regulatoriska krav.
* Identifiera, utvärdera och mildra cybersäkerhetsrisker samtidigt som du ger ledningsgruppen vägledning om potentiella hot och riskhanteringsstrategier.
* Främja en kultur av säkerhetsmedvetenhet genom att implementera utbildningsprogram och främja bästa praxis för cybersäkerhet i hela organisationen.



  





**Vi tror att du har:** 



* 7+ års erfarenhet inom informationssäkerhet, varav minst 3 år i en ledande roll som CISO eller motsvarande.
* Relevanta certifieringar som CISSP, CISM eller ISO 27001 Lead Implementer/Auditor.
* Djupgående kunskap om ISO 27001 med erfarenhet av att driva strategiska efterlevnadsinsatser.
* Kunskap och förståelse för efterlevnadsramverk som är tillämpliga på vårt företag, såsom NIS2, GDPR, DORA, Säkerhetsskyddslagen.
* Stark förståelse för IT-system, nätverkssäkerhet, molnsäkerhet och dataskyddsteknologier.
* Erfarenhet av cybersäkerhetsriskbedömningar och hantering, inklusive incidenthantering och respons.



  





 Vi tror också att du har förmåga att effektivt kommunicera tekniska koncept till icke-tekniska intressenter samt leda mångsidiga team mot gemensamma mål.
 



  





**Varför Cparta?** 




 Vårt moderna kontor i hjärtat av Stockholm erbjuder en inspirerande arbetsmiljö tillsammans med fantastiska kollegor i en platt organisation. Vi främjar en kultur av nyfikenhet och innovation där varje medarbetares bidrag värderas högt. Vi erbjuder dessutom ett förmånspaket i toppklass samtidigt som du får vara med och försvara Sveriges integritet!
 



  





**Krav** 




 För att arbeta hos oss måste du vara svensk medborgare, ostraffad och genomgå en bakgrundskontroll.
 



  





**Ansökan** 




 Har du frågor om tjänsten? Kontakta Laura Sonnert på
 **lso@cparta.se** 
 . Vi rekryterar löpande, så skicka in din ansökan så snart som möjligt och bli en del av vårt växande team.

title: Patent consultant within Hightech – Trainee program at HØIBERG
description:
Do you want to help shape the future of technological innovations? At HØIBERG, you’ll have a unique opportunity to combine your technical expertise in hightech with business development and intellectual property law. Are you a curious problem-solver with a passion for technology and eager to work in a dynamic and innovative environment? Are you ready for a long-term career where every day presents new intellectual challenges? Then the role of Patent Consultant is perfect for you!
 


 Apply here!
 
  

**Company :**
 HØIBERG
 



  

**City :**
 Stockholm
 



  

**Job Category :**
 Technology
 



  

**Extent :**
 Full time
 



  

**Start date :**
 According to agreement
 



  

**Type of work :**
 Recruitment
   




**About the role**

 HØIBERG is continuing its expansion in Stockholm and is now looking for two new patent consultants to join its teams at the offices located at Karolinska Institutet and KTH. We are hiring one consultant with a focus on hightech and another with a focus on medical technology.
 


  


 As part of our team, you will work with a wide range of clients, from research-driven startups to global companies, helping them develop strategies to protect their intellectual property. As a patent consultant, you will be responsible for providing business-oriented and strategic guidance throughout the entire patent process – from the initial innovation to a granted patent. No prior experience or knowledge of patent law is required, as we provide comprehensive on-site training. We are looking for individuals with strong technical backgrounds who are eager to apply their theoretical knowledge in real-world business scenarios.
 


  


 During your first 3–5 years, you will undergo a comprehensive training program that will prepare you to qualify as a European Patent Attorney. Part of this training will be integrated into your daily work alongside experienced colleagues in Stockholm and Copenhagen. However, you will also need to dedicate some of your own time to patent education during this period.
 


  


 At HØIBERG, we foster a culture of curiosity and collaboration without hierarchy. We place great value on close cooperation between all our Nordic offices, leveraging each other's expertise to deliver the best possible results for our clients.
 


  


  

**You are offered:**



  

  
* An industry-leading and comprehensive training program in patents, with the opportunity for personalized guidance and mentorship from some of the top patent experts in both Stockholm and Copenhagen
  
* Excellent opportunities for becoming a European Patent Attorney, with a clear career path and support throughout the process
  
* The chance to work closely with innovative companies and have a direct impact on their future success by safeguarding their intellectual property
  
* Generous employment benefits, including wellness allowances, occupational pensions, the possibility of hybrid work, and a performance-based bonus system that rewards your dedication
  

  


**Work tasks**

 As a patent consultant, you will utilize your strong analytical skills to quickly grasp new technical challenges and problem areas. The role involves a wide range of interactions with clients, colleagues, and authorities, while also requiring independent work and taking responsibility for the entire patent process. To succeed in this role, you should be motivated by long-term, persistent work—both on client cases and in your personal development. As a patent consultant, you will evaluate the patentability of innovations and their commercial potential, which requires you to gain a thorough understanding of your clients' businesses.
 


  


 Your key responsibilities will include:
 


  

  
* Conducting client meetings and providing strategic advice on how to best protect their intellectual property
  
* Reviewing new inventions to assess their patentability
  
* Drafting patent applications and managing patent processes on a global scale
  
* Keeping up to date with advancements in your technical specialty, while actively driving your own education and development
  
* Continuously evaluating and refining your working methods to ensure efficiency and maintain a high work pace
  

  


**We are looking for**
  
* A PhD, or a master’s degree with relevant work experience, in one of the following fields: technical physics, mechanics, mechatronics, electrical engineering, nanotechnology, or another related field considered equivalent by the employer
  
* Someone who is ready to use their technical expertise and broaden their competence to work across multiple and new technical fields. We envision that you will work broadly within areas such as mechanical systems, additive manufacturing, advanced sensors, AI-based tools, renewable energy technologies, robotics, and autonomous systems
  
* A strong interest in developing expertise within intellectual property law (no prior experience required)
  
* A strong command of English, both spoken and written
  
* It is an advantage if you also have spoken and written proficiency in Swedish
  


  


 To apply for this position, you must have a valid work permit for Sweden.
 


  


 In this recruitment process, we will place particular emphasis on the following personal qualities:
 


  

  
* Goal-oriented and driven
  
* Structured and detail-oriented
  
* Analytical and good at problem-solving
  
* Comfortable working both independently and as part of a team
  


  


  

**Recruitment process**



  

  
* Phone screening with Academic Work
  
* In-depth interview with Academic Work
  
* Interview 1 with HØIBERG
  
* Interview 2 with HØIBERG
  
* Reference check
  


  

  

**Our recruitment process**
  


 This recruitment process is handled by Academic Work and it is our client’s wish that all questions regarding the position is directed to Academic Work. Contact information: Recruitment Consultant Emelie Säfbom, emelie.safbom@academicwork.se
 


  


 Our selection process is continuous and the advert may close before the recruitment process is completed if we have moved forward to the next phase. The process includes two tests: one personality test and one cognitive test. The tests are tools to find the right talent for the right position, to enable equality, diversity, and a fair process.
   




**HØIBERG**

 HØIBERG is a European intellectual property firm that advises its clients on all aspects of intellectual property rights, including patents and IP strategies. They help ambitious and innovative companies create tomorrow's products by protecting their intellectual property rights today. Read more about HØIBERG on their website!
   




**Get directly recruited to HØIBERG**

 When you apply to this application, you will get hired by our partner. This means that you can relax while we take care of the application process.
   




**Do you have questions about this job?**

 Emelie Säfbom or a colleague in the recruitment team will gladly answer you on stv3@academicwork.se Please specify advert-ID in your email: 15108042

title: Leveransansvarig IT
description:
IT
   

  

 Leveransansvarig IT
   

  

 Nu finns det en spännande möjlighet att bli en del av framgångsrika Praktikertjänst. Vi söker efter dig som vill axla rollen som leveransansvarig. Stämmer nedan annons in på dig och dina erfarenheter så ser vi fram emot din ansökan redan idag!
   

  

 Om tjänsten
   

  

 För tjänsten som leveransansvarig inom koncerngemensam IT (KGIT) söker vi dig med en förmåga att ansvara för förvalta och kontinuerligt förbättra Praktikertjänst IT-miljö över tid. Du drivs av att leverera med kvalitet, navigera och hantera förändringsbenägna miljöer, samt arbeta självständigt och beslutsamt med stöd av regelverk och processer. Rollen ställer höga krav på ledarskapsegenskaper samt engagera ett team med olika tekniska specialister inom infrastruktur i ett multileverantörslandskap. Du räds inte för att uttrycka dina åsikter och står fast vid dina beslut, även i utmanande situationer. Rollen är en specialist-roll och du rapporterar till Chef för KGIT. Du arbetar med och leder ett team bestående av ett antal koordinatorer samt tekniker från IT-drift med olika kompetenser.
   

  

 Tjänsten är utrustad med datorer, skärmar och kringutrustning samt nödvändig programvara, där Windows 11 fungerar som operativsystem. För personalhantering används e-post via Microsoft 365 (M365) och datorerna administreras centralt genom Intune med certifikatshantering via SCEPman. Säkerhetslösningarna omfattar säker inloggning och identitetshantering, skydd mot informationsläckage samt avancerat skydd mot skadlig kod. För molnbaserad fillagring används OneDrive för individuella filer, medan Teams fungerar som plattform för både lagring av gemensamma filer och som ett verktyg för samarbete och kommunikation i arbetsgrupper. IT-lösningen stödjer även journalsystem såsom Frenda för tandvård samt regionsspecifika system för hälso- och sjukvård, inklusive Frenda röntgen för tandvård. Integration av medicinsk och dentalteknisk utrustning med datorer säkerställs också.
   

  

 Nätverksinfrastrukturen är segmenterad för att garantera hög säkerhet och stabilitet. Utskriftslösningar hanteras via en molnbaserad “follow-me-print”-tjänst, och utskriftstjänsterna inkluderar även leverans och underhåll av hårdvara. Support erbjuds både via telefon och e-post, samt på plats vid behov. Ansvar för att IT-miljön uppfyller de lagstadgade kraven för Praktikertjänst som vårdgivare, liksom regionala krav, ligger på leverantören. Samarbete sker under avtal med tre huvudsakliga leverantörer och deras underleverantörer, för att säkerställa att den tekniska miljön lever upp till förväntade standarder och krav.
   

  

 Dina arbetsuppgifter i huvudsak
   

  

* I leverans och förvaltningsansvaret ingår att du ansvarar för, planerar och koordinerar att IT-miljön sätts upp vid nybyggnationer, uppköp och ombyggnad av Praktikertjänst mottagningar tillsammans med leverantörer. Även för att avveckling av IT-miljön sker på ett kvalitativt sätt när mottagningar stänger.
* Du har resultatansvar, vilket inkluderar budgetering, framtag av prognoser och löpande månadsrapportering med avvikelserapportering.
* Du jobbar kontinuerligt med att förbättra Praktikertjänst IT-miljö baserat på återkoppling från slutanvändare vid referensgruppsmöten men även för att säkra lagefterlevnad.
* Du deltar i operativa forum för uppföljning av leverans mot avtal (SLA) samt tekniska forum med IT driftsresurser
* Du driver samverkans forum med Praktikertjänst leverantörer för att säkra bra samarbete mellan alla parter och att uppsatta processer efterlevs
* Du agerar i rollen ”problem manager” för KGIT och deltar i tekniska forum för att undanröja hinder för effektiv leverans.


 Vem är du?
   

  

 För att lyckas i rollen ser vi att du uppfyller följande skallkrav:
   

  

* Universitets- eller högskoleutbildning inom data/systemvetenskap eller motsvarande erfarenhet.
* Minst fem års erfarenhet av tekniskt ledarskap inom leverans, exempelvis roll som TAM eller dylikt. Du har även erfarenhet av förvaltning (system eller teknik), planering, prioritering, uppföljning, sammanställning, budgetera och resultatansvar, efterlevnad.
* Erfarenhet av att bygga och sätta nya processer kopplat till leverans och behov från både kund och funktion (IT).
* Förmåga att självständigt kunna analysera, få framdrift i ett utestående tekniskt problem, föreslå en lösning, ta fram beslutsunderlag samt dokumentera detta.
* Erfarenhet av att styra leveranser från multileverantörslandskap, riskhantering och mitigering av risker i en teknisk leveranssituation.
* Förmåga att kravställa relevant dokumentation från leverantör och att ta fram och dokumentera instruktioner och guidelines både till IT-drift och till support.


**Det Är Även Meriterande Om Du Har**
* Erfarenhet av och kunskap om digital arbetsplats, hårdvara, Azure, M365-plattformen, integrationer från dator till annan utrustning, vilket i detta fall innefattat betalterminaler, kvittoskrivare, dental- samt medicinteknisk utrustning
* Erfarenhet i leverans av teknisk utrustning inom ett av områdena medicin- eller dentalteknik.
* Förmåga att kunna felsöka och se vad som avser problem med hårdvara och vad som avser mjukvara som tex journal och röntgensystem


 Vidare söker vi efter dig som är professionell och en god Praktikertjänst-ambassadör. För att axla rollen krävs att du är ansvarstagande, har ett driv och framåtanda. Du är självständig men drivs av att leda teamet till uppsatta mål. Med lyhördhet och hög social kompetens kan du hantera alla typer av människor och är strukturerad och noggrann. Praktikertjänst sätter stort värde på personlighet.
   

  

 Om verksamheten
   

  

 Praktikertjänst startade för över 60 år sedan och är en av Sveriges största vårdgivare. Vi har 750 mottagningar, från Vittangi i norr till Ystad i söder, som drivs av praktiker som tillsammans äger hela Praktikertjänst. Vi är övertygade om att det skapar engagemang, delaktighet, fokus på kvalitet, kontinuitet samt kompetensutveckling – och är en viktig anledning till att vi varje år hamnar i topp vad gäller både nöjda patienter och medarbetare. Hos oss får du en trygg anställning med fina förmåner och goda möjligheter till både personlig och professionell utveckling. Vi vet att våra medarbetares välbefinnande är grunden till nöjda patienter och i det långa loppet, ett mer välmående samhälle.
   

  

 Mer information på: http://www.praktikertjanst.se
   

  

 Rekryteringen görs i samarbete med Poolia och du är varmt välkommen att höra av dig till Jennifer Nilsson om du har några funderingar. Intervjuer sker löpande och tillsättningen kan komma att ske innan sista ansökningsdatumet, så tveka inte på att skicka in din ansökan redan idag! Vi ser fram emot att höra mer om dig och dina erfarenheter.

title: Förvaltningsledare IT till Rättsmedicinalverket
description:
”
 *Att jobba som projektledare på Rättsmedicinalverket är utvecklande. Samtidigt som jag är statsanställd och har intressanta arbetsuppgifter, är jag med och utvecklar ett rättssäkert samhälle. På Rättsmedicinalverket får jag göra både och!”*
* Nina Dahlin, projektledare it på huvudkontoret i Stockholm


 På Rättsmedicinalverket (RMV) har du möjlighet att utöva din profession samtidigt som du tillsammans med dina kollegor bidrar till att skapa ett rättssäkert samhälle. Nu söker vi förvaltningsledare till it- och digitaliseringsenheten med placering antingen på huvudkontoret centralt i Stockholm eller i Linköping.
   

  

 It- och digitaliseringsenheten ingår i myndighetens huvudkontor och ansvarar för drift, förvaltning och utveckling av digitala lösningar. Myndigheten har specialutvecklade it-lösningar, egen it-infrastruktur och utgör en viktig funktion för myndighetens verksamhet och medarbetare på RMV. För närvarande genomför RMV en satsning för att modernisera sin it-miljö och bygga upp en funktionell och välanpassad it-organisation. It- och digitaliseringsenhetens uppdrag utvecklas kontinuerligt med flera stora och komplexa projekt de närmaste åren, däribland ett myndighetsövergripande ärendehanteringssystem. För att långsiktigt leverera på dessa åtaganden och möta verksamhetens behov behöver enheten permanent växa och förstärkas med ytterligare resurser och kompetens.
   

  

**Ditt uppdrag**
* leda tekniska projekt, vilket inkluderar implementering av nya it-lösningar till verksamheten eller vidareutveckling av befintlig it-lösning inom dina ansvarsområden
* ansvara för förvaltning och kontinuerlig förbättring av it-lösningar inom dina ansvarsområden. Du säkerställer att våra it-lösningar är tillgängliga för verksamheten enligt överenskommen nivå, samverkar med verksamhetsföreträdare och är delaktig i planering och verkställer it-relaterade aktiviteter på ett kostnadseffektivt sätt
* bistå vid upphandlingar av it-lösningar, med särskilt fokus på teknisk kravspecifikation och utvärdering av leverantörers förslag.


**Kvalifikationer**
 Du har:
   

  

* högskoleutbildning (exempelvis datavetenskap, mjukvaruutveckling eller systemvetenskap) eller motsvarande erfarenhet som arbetsgivaren bedömer som likvärdig.
* aktuell dokumenterad erfarenhet av teknisk förvaltningsledning eller motsvarande erfarenhet som arbetsgivaren bedömer som likvärdig.
* goda kunskaper i svenska i tal och skrift.


**Meriterande**
 Det är meriterande om du har:
   

  

* kunskap och erfarenhet från några av följande it-områden, exempelvis systemutveckling, kravanalys, test, arkitektur, integration eller it-infrastruktur
* ledarerfarenhet och/eller erfarenhet av förändringsledning
* kännedom om ITIL, pm3 eller motsvarande styrmodeller
* kunskap och erfarenhet av offentliga upphandlingar


**Personliga egenskaper och förmågor**
 Vi fäster stor vikt vid personliga egenskaper. Vi söker dig som kombinerar teknisk kompetens med starka ledaregenskaper. Du har en god samarbetsförmåga och kan kommunicera på ett lyhört och konstruktivt sätt och har förmåga att skapa och underhålla goda arbetsrelationer. För att lyckas i rollen behöver du vara självgående och ta ansvar för att driva dina arbetsuppgifter vidare samt vara utvecklingsfokuserad när det gäller att utveckla dina kunskaper avseende både vår kärnverksamhet och våra it-lösningar. Vidare är du strukturerad och planerar och prioriterar ditt arbete på ett effektivt sätt.
   

  

**Anställningen**
 Anställningen är en tillsvidareanställning på heltid som inleds med sex månaders provanställning. Tillträde sker enligt överenskommelse. Placering i Stockholm eller Linköping. Myndighetens enheter finns på olika orter i Sverige, varför resor i tjänsten kan förekomma. Det finns utifrån verksamhetens behov möjlighet att teckna enskild överenskommelse om distansarbete del av arbetstid.
   

  

 Vi tillämpar en kompetensbaserad rekryteringsprocess och det kan förekomma arbetspsykologiska tester, kunskapsprov eller arbetsprov. I vissa av våra rekryteringar genomförs en bakgrundskontroll.
   

  

 I samband med anställning vid Rättsmedicinalverket följer en skyldighet att krigsplaceras.
   

  

**Vill du också vara med och bidra till ett rättssäkert samhälle?**
 Välkommen med din
 **ansökan senast den 18:e november.** 
 Betyg och övriga handlingar tas med vid en eventuell intervju.
   

  

 Rättsmedicinalverket värnar om en rekrytering fri från diskriminering och strävar efter att ge lika möjligheter för alla.
   

  

**Vill du veta mer?**
 För mer information är du välkommen att kontakta rekryterande chef, David Efrem Solomon, tfn 010-483 49 81. Fackliga företrädare för Saco är Maritha Torkildsen Nilsson, tfn 010-483 41 27, för ST/OFR Selma El Hadi, tfn 010-483 46 34 och för Seko Christer Johansson, tfn 010-483 46 24.
   

  

 Ta gärna del av våra förmåner:
   

  

 https://www.rmv.se/om-oss/jobba-hos-oss/att-jobba-pa-rattsmedicinalverket/formaner-hos-oss/
   

  

 Vi är den medicinska länken i rättskedjan. Här jobbar rättsläkare, utredare, rättsmedicinska assistenter, biomedicinska analytiker, administratörer och många fler på uppdrag av bland andra polis, åklagare och domstol.
   

  

 Här kan du möta några av våra medarbetare:
   

  

 https://www.rmv.se/om-oss/jobba-hos-oss/vara-medarbetare/

title: Manager - Stockholm | BCG Platinion
description:
As a Manager at BCG Platinion in the Nordics, you are responsible for the execution and management of our national and international client projects. We collaborate with colleagues from BCG Platinion and/or the Boston Consulting Group on site and directly with the client company.
   

  

 The Manager role incorporates structuring the project and performing the required resource planning. Besides the functional navigation of the project members, you will also be involved operationally in the project business. Together with our clients, you will develop convincing IT strategies, concepts and solutions, applying technical know-how and extensive experience in structuring IT projects, just as analytical and conceptual skills. We independently support our clients, present our results to their decision makers, and agree on the next steps.
   

  

 Shape the world of tomorrow
   

  

* Independently contribute to build close client relationships - and as their trusted advisor, you are the first to whom they turn
* Acquire new projects and challenges for our company and yourself
* Be in charge of planning, leading, and assuring quality for strategic IT projects - we work with passion for our clients' long-term success
* Get to use your comprehensive knowledge of technology and industry understanding to provide both internal and external stakeholders with the orientation they need in critical project phases and challenging situations
* Think across projects and connecting factors, and plan resources to achieve the best efficiency possible
* Take ownership for presenting key project results at the highest level of client management
* Work with an entrepreneurial approach and passion to advance BCG Platinion with your contributions to people development, recruiting, and practice areas


 You can help us make a difference if you
   

  

* bring a completed a degree in computer science, (business) informatics, or a related area with above-average grades
* have at least eight years of substantial experience in IT consulting and the lead design and management of IT strategy and implementation projects
* already captured project-related management experience as the lead of teams with more than five people
* know how to plan IT initiatives and build solid business cases
* optimally steer decisions towards the goal and master escalating situations with an eye to solutions - even in complex organizational structures
* have successfully acquired consulting projects
* are excellent at understanding and communicating complex topics in English


 How to grow with us
   

  

 We guarantee constant development incentives in an open and rewarding work environment! Together with a dedicated team of talented colleagues, you get to work on new challenges every day. Individual training offers and a culture of open feedback will provide the framework needed to explore and perfect personal strengths. Our modern structures allow focusing on the essence of our work - with easy travel booking, an excellent back-office support and comprehensive Knowledge Center. With our regular office Fridays and legendary events, we nurture a strong and close team network beyond our case work.
   

  

*BCG Platinion is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, age, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity / expression, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected under national, provincial, or local law, where applicable.*

title: Specialist inom IT-övervakning till myndighet sökes
description:
Vi söker nu dig som är specialist på IT-övervakning och som vill jobba i en samhällsviktig organisation. Detta uppdrag kommer sträcka sig över 24 månader och du kommer få ta stort ansvar i att driva övervakningsfrågor framåt i organisationen.
 



  

**Plats :**
 Sundbyberg
 



  

**Jobbkategori :**
 IT
 



  

**Omfattning :**
 Heltid, 24 månader från 1:a december
 



  

**Startdatum :**
 1:a december
 



  

**Typ av uppdrag :**
 Konsultuppdrag
 



  

**Övrigt :**
 Möjlighet till distansarbete
   




**Om tjänsten**

 Vi söker för vår kunds räkning en IT-specialist, inom IT-övervakning till det team som arbetar med att förvalta de centrala IT-övervakningsplattformarna till stöd för övriga IT-förvaltningar och utvecklingsprojekt. Bland våra IT-övervakningsplattformar ingår bland OP5, Icinga och SCOM. Uppdraget omfattar både arbetsuppgifter av mer koordinerande och planerade karaktär samt mer praktiska och operativa arbetsuppgifter som sker hands-on i våra plattformar och system. Vi söker dig som är som har god erfarenhet inom området och kan med dina erfarenheter bidra till utvecklingen inom området.
 


  


  

**Du erbjuds**



  

  
* Ett uppdrag på 24 månader hos ett av Sveriges viktigaste infrastrukturbolag
  

  


**Arbetsuppgifter**
  
* Vidareutveckling – av de centrala observerbarhets- och monitoreringsplattformarna.
  
* Hantera incidenter och problem - analysera och lösa problem och incidenter samt bistå i framtagande av instruktioner för t.ex. incidenthantering. Detta i nära samarbete med 24/7 systemövervakningsfunktionen inom samma enhet.
  
* Specialist - agera specialist och vara primär kontaktväg för systemspecifika frågor.
  
* Generell support - support och stöd till andra system, verksamheten och externa parter.
  
* Genomföra ändringar - hantera beställningar enligt gällande processer och genomföra ändringar i systemen i enlighet med företagets changeprocess. Underhålla och genomföra nödvändiga uppgraderingar.
  
* Dokumentation - arbeta tillsammans med teamet för att säkra god förvaltningsdokumentation och specificera de tekniska krav som ställs på lösningarna.
  
* IT-säkerhet - arbeta med frågor rörande IT-säkerhet för att säkerställa hög tillgänglighet, kvalitet etc.
  

  


**Vi söker dig som**
  
* **Minst 3 års arbetslivserfarenhet av att förvalta och utveckla IT-övervakning inom Icinga/Nagios-baserade plattformar**
  
* **Minst 3 års arbetslivserfarenhet inom systemadministration av Linux-plattformar**
  
* **Minst 3 år arbetslivserfarenhet inom scriptspråk (exempelvis Bash, Python eller Perl)**
  
* **Minst 1 års arbetslivserfarenhet, inom de senaste 3 åren, att ha arbetat med automatiseringsverktyg (exempelvis Ansible)**
  


  


 För att gå vidare i processen måste samtliga av dessa krav vara uppfyllda och tydligt framgå i ditt CV. Annars kommer vi inte kunna gå vidare med din ansökan.
 


  


  

**Det är meriterande om du har**



  

  
* **Minst 1 år arbetslivserfarenhet inom Observerbarhetsplattformar: exempelvis Grafana enterprise**
  
* **Minst 2 år arbetslivserfarenhet inom RHEL och Redhat satellite**
  
* **Minst 2 år arbetslivserfarenhet inom SE-Linux**
  
* **Minst 3 års arbetslivserfarenhet av nätverksadministration (Switching, Routing, firewalls, TCP/IP)**
  
* **Minst 1 års arbetslivserfarenhet miljöer med höga säkerhetskrav (exempel CIS, ISO27002, IEC 62443, ICS/OT)**
  


  

  

**Vår rekryteringsprocess**
  


 Denna rekryteringsprocess hanteras av Academic Work och vår kunds önskemål är att alla frågor rörande tjänsten skickas till Academic Work.
 


  


 Vi tillämpar löpande urval och kommer plocka ner annonsen när tillräckligt många kandidater har nått slutskedet i rekryteringsprocessen. Rekryteringsprocessen innehåller två urvalstest: ett personlighetstest och ett test i kognitiv förmåga. Testerna är ett verktyg för att kunna hitta den kandidat med högst potential för tjänsten samt främja jämlikhet, mångfald och en rättvis rekryteringsprocess.
   




**Bli en del av Academic Work**

 Som konsult för Academic Work erbjuds du stora möjligheter att växa professionellt och knyta värdefulla kontakter för framtiden. Du får en konsultchef som stöttar dig under resans gång och får ta del av olika förmåner, bl.a. möjlighet till kompetensutveckling i form av en grundläggande hållbarhetsutbildning.
 


 Läs mer om vårt konsulterbjudande här
   

**Har du frågor om tjänsten?**

 Nils Norgren eller någon av kollegorna i rekryteringsteamet svarar dig gärna på sth2@academicwork.se Ange annons-ID i ditt mail: 15108107

title: SigtunaHem söker boservicesamordnare på visstidsanställning
description:
**Om arbetsplatsen**
 Sigtuna kommun är en plats med stor spännvidd. Här ryms levande landsbygd, småstad och en internationell flygplats. Ett rikt kulturarv och kulturell mångfald. En stolt historia och stora framtidsplaner. Kanske är det därför drivkraften är så stark att växa, förändras och utvecklas. Det är också därför det är så spännande att arbeta här. Hos oss blir du del av en trevlig och prestigelös kultur där vi hjälps åt och tar tillvara på varandras kunskap, olikheter och erfarenheter. Arbetet är ofta omväxlande, ibland utmanande men alltid meningsfullt. Välkommen hit!
   

  

 SigtunaHem äger och förvaltar 4 800 lägenheter med hyresrätt i Sigtuna kommun. Vi är ett serviceföretag som erbjuder attraktivt boende och vår verksamhet kännetecknas av långsiktighet och hållbarhet. Vår främsta uppgift är att utveckla trygga och trivsamma boendemiljöer med hög servicegrad. Vi bygger både hyresrätter och bostadsrätter och skapar hållbara, levande och väl fungerande bostadsområden och stadsdelar.
   

  

**Arbetsuppgifter**
 Som Boservicessamordnare är du anställd som Bovärd och har ett ansvarstillägg som Bovärdssamordnare.
   

  

 Du kommer att vara en arbetsledande funktion för vår Bovärdsgrupp. Bovärdarnas primära mål är att ge våra hyresgäster den bästa möjliga hjälpen i sina hem och allmänna utrymmen.
   

  

 Du kommer att vara Boservicechefens förlängda arm i organisationen och stödja avdelningen att uppnå sina mål. Du ska även vara beredd att utföra operativt arbete som Bovärd när det behövs och kunna balansera mellan administrativt och operativt arbete. Din roll kommer även vara betydande för ett givande samarbete med resten av organisationen.
   

  

* Driva och samordna Bovärdsarbetet i genomförandet av uppdraget.
* Framtagning av arbetssätt internt inom avdelningen men även inom processer.
* Ansvara för kvaliteten på Bovärdarnas arbete och dokumentation.
* Vara second-line till Bovärdarna i operativa-frågor
* Avtalsuppföljning av leverantörer
* Delta i organisationsövergripande projekt
* Bidra till ett effektivt och utvecklande samarbete tillsammans med de andra avdelningarna inom bolaget.


**Kvalifikationer**
 Vi vill att vår framtida Bovärdssamordnare är en driven, nyfiken, flexibel och prestigelös person som vill leverera hög service genom ett proffsigt bemötande. Du ska drivas av att förenkla och förtydliga med god service som mål.
   

  

 Vi tror att du har
   

  

* Erfarenhet av att utveckla processer och arbetssätt.
* 5 års arbetslivserfarenhet inom fastighetsservice eller motsvarande.
* Några (minst 2) års erfarenhet i en arbetsledande roll.
* Mycket god känsla för service / kundbemötande
* God datorvana inom officepaketet och IT-system
* Svenska och engelska i både tal och skrift (övriga språk är meriterande)
* B-körkort


 Meriterande
   

  

* Språkkunskap
* Erfarenhet som chef / personalansvarig.
* Erfarenhet/kunskap inom ISO
* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av att driva projekt med bra utfall.
* Erfarenhet av momentum som fastighetssystem .


**Övrig information**
* Vad erbjuder vi dig?


 SigtunaHem är del av den svenska allmännyttan. Vi är certifierat för miljö- och kvalitetsledning enligt ISO 14001 och ISO 9001. Vi sitter i fina och ljusa lokaler i Märsta med bara någon minuts promenad från Märsta station, hit tar du dig enkelt med både pendeltåg och SJ-tåg.
   

  

 Här får du ett fritt och omväxlande arbete där du får många stimulerande arbetsuppgifter och kontakter med olika slags människor. Vi står inför spännande utmaningar, med både ny- och ombyggnationer, i en av landets snabbast växande och mest attraktiva kommuner med nära till allt.
   

  

 Vi erbjuder också ett gediget förmånspaket bestående av bland annat, kort dag före röd dag, friskvårdsbidrag, subventionerad naprapat, vaccinationer och kompetensutveckling.
   

  

 Vi strävar efter en jämn ålders- och könsfördelning och ser mångfald som en styrka och välkomnar därför sökande med olika bakgrund.
   

  

 Inför rekryteringsarbetet har vi tagit ställning till rekryteringskanaler och marknadsföring. Vi undanbeder oss därför bestämt kontakt med mediesäljare, rekryteringssajter och liknande.

title: Creative Brand & Marketing Manager
description:
**About Bhoof** 





 Bhoof is a Swedish startup within equestrian equipment, founded by world know showjumper Peder Fredricson. We aim to harness the traditions within equestrian and integrate it with new design and materials to create comfortable, safe, lightweight 
 
**next-generation equipment for both the horse and rider** 

 . The goal is to create optimal conditions that enable the horse and rider to perform together at the peak of their potential.
 




  





**The Role** 





 As Bhoofs 
 
**Creative Brand & Marketing Manager** 

 , you will be responsible to create and executing the global brand and marketing strategy. To build Bhoofs global brand identity, increase brand awareness, traffic and sales in the online and offline channels. This role encompasses all aspects of creative brand marketing, including engaging the Bhoof community, build a global visual brand identity, co-own the commercial calendar to drive SEO, SEM, athlete and email marketing activities. You will work closely with the CEO and E-Commerce & Operations Manager and report directly to the CEO. 
 




  
 



**Tasks** 




**Content management** 

  
 
**& creative direction** 



* Responsible for all content, such as images, videos and communication in Bhoofs channels. Canva/other tool is a must to master.
* Oversee the creation of visual and written content, including campaign concepts, graphic design, and copywriting.
* Plan and execute external and internal photoshoots. Requirement specifications for external parties such as photographers & creators if used.
* Ensure brand visuals and messaging align with the intended audience and goals.



  





**Own the brand identity** 



* Creative plan and execute marketing campaigns online and offline, including SEO, SEM, athlete, email marketing, and social media to achieve sales targets.
* Manage the 
 
**budget,** 

 ensuring efficient resource allocation to maximize ROI.
* Identity and maintain relationships with third-party vendors, such as digital marketing agency.



  





**Analysis & reporting** 



* Collect and analyze data for evaluation and ensure that Bhoof meets targets in identified channel.



  





**Community management** 



* Develop strategies to build a loyal customer community.
* Monitor and interact with followers and users on our platforms to build and maintain relationships, as well as manage feedback and customer interactions.



  





**Trends & industry knowledge** 



* Follow trends and understand what is the latest in the industry to support the strategies and tactics after the changes in the market.



  





**Needed** 



* A minimum of 2-5 years of experience in a Marketing or Brand Manager role, preferably within a sport or fashion brand and with an omnichannel mindset.
* A bachelor’s degree in marketing, business or a related field.
* Fluency in both English and Swedish.
* Proven success in increasing brand awareness, traffic and sales.
* Outgoing, collaborative, and self-driven, always seeking growth opportunities.
* Knowledge and/or interest in equestrian sports.



  






 We are a growing start-up with a small agile team based in Stockholm, seeking someone eager to join us on this journey to further develop our brand and marketing strategy and drive our global growth into new markets. You will bring a strategic, very hands-on approach, with a strong background in digital marketing and branding. 
 




  




* **Employment:** 
  Full-time
* **Location** 
 : Stockholm, Östermalm. We like to be in the office but are also working from home time to time.
* Will require some travelling
* **Start:** 
  As agreed



  






 We launched the brand and our website in March 2024. Bhoof wants to improve the equestrian sport by being a driving force of combining horse welfare and high level equestrian sport for the future.
 




  






 Sounds interesting?
 




  






 Submit your CV and cover letter to 
 
**antonia@bhoof.com** 

 and write “
 
**Creative** 

  
 
**Brand & Marketing Manager”** 

  in the subject line. Be aware that we will request work samples as part of the recruitment process.

title: Senior Research Scientist
description:
At Cepheid, we are passionate about improving health care through fast, accurate diagnostic testing. Our mission drives us, every moment of every day, as we develop scalable, groundbreaking solutions to solve the world’s most complex health challenges. Our associates are involved in every stage of molecular diagnostics, from ideation to development and delivery of testing advancements that improve patient outcomes across a range of settings. As a member of our team, you can make an immediate, measurable impact on a global scale, within an environment that fosters career growth and development.
   

  

 Cepheid is proud to work alongside a community of six fellow Danaher Diagnostics companies. Together, we’re working at the pace of change on diagnostic tools that address the world’s biggest health challenges, driven by knowing that behind every test there is a patient waiting.
   

  

 Learn about the Danaher Business System which makes everything possible.
   

  

*The Senior Research Scientist is responsible for developing and validating molecular testing for Cepheid products, ensuring their accuracy and reliability. This includes designing experiments, analyzing data, and collaborating with cross-functional teams. The ideal candidate will have experience in product commercialization, and expert knowledge of molecular techniques (such as nucleic acid extraction and real time PCR). As a member of the R&D team you will contribute with your knowledge and skills to junior team members and other functions within the organization. Furthermore, you have a good ability to analyze technical data and review/write texts and reports. You find it easy to collaborate and are keen to achieve results in your work.*
 This position is part of the Assay R&D team and will be in Solna, Sweden. At Cepheid, our vision is to be the leading provider of seamlessly connected diagnostic solutions.
   

  

**In this role, you will have the opportunity to:**
* Evaluate, test, and optimize real time PCR and RT-PCR assay procedures and assay prototypes based on design of experiments and design input requirements.
* Apply sophisticated analytical problem-solving skills to reagent and system integration issues to identify critical performance factors for assay development
* Design, plan and execute experiments to meet project and company objectives
* Work both independently and in a team environment
* Analyze data using statistical tools such as Microsoft Excel, Minitab or JMP
* Communicate data in different forums on a regular basis
* Work in a BSL3 environment


 The role also includes participating in project planning, decision-making and problem solving.
   

  

 Cepheid offers a dynamic and fast-paced role in a company with products that save lives. You will join a team with competent people who have fun together.
   

  

**The essential requirements of the job include:**
* BSc or MSc in relevant scientific discipline (e.g., Molecular Biology, Biochemistry, Cell Biology) with 5+ years of related work experience within medical device (preferred), biotech, or pharmaceutical
* Must have strong background in molecular biology methods such as PCR and real-time PCR, experimental design, data analysis and statistical techniques
* Experience of working in a regulated business (ISO and/or GMP)
* Strong oral and written communication skills
* Good ability to structure, organize and prioritize lab work and to maintain detailed experimental records
* Thorough understanding and adherence to biosafety protocols and guidelines, ensuring a safe and compliant laboratory environment for handling biological materials and hazardous substances


**It would be a plus if you also possess previous experience in:**
* Experience in the development of medical technology and/or pharmaceutical products (knowledge of US and/or CE-IVD medical technology regulations)
* Proficiency in assay optimization and validation: Understanding how to optimize and validate assays for accuracy, sensitivity, and specificity


 Join our winning team today. Together, we’ll accelerate the real-life impact of tomorrow’s science and technology. We partner with customers across the globe to help them solve their most complex challenges, architecting solutions that bring the power of science to life.
   

  

 For more information, visit www.danaher.com.
   

  

 At Danaher, we value diversity and the existence of similarities and differences, both visible and not, found in our workforce, workplace and throughout the markets we serve. Our associates, customers and shareholders contribute unique and different perspectives as a result of these diverse attributes.

title: Pega developer/Architect
description:
**We continue to grow within Pega and we need certified experts – Are you in for this challenge?**
**The Role**
 Together with experienced and specialized colleagues, you help our customers with everything from advice in early stages to the implementation and integration of the Pega platform. Our global experience and expertise within Pega give us a unique opportunity to effectively solve our customers’ challenges when it comes to quickly introducing changes to new business needs and opportunities. We continuously help you to develop your skills, certifications and interesting customer assignments for a solid career development.
   

  

**Your profile**
* Experience in BPM / CRM development
* Good knowledge of both Swedish and English, oral as writing is a must
* A great drive to develop and adopt new technology


**Preferably Certified Within Pega As**
* CSSA
* CLSA


**We Offer**
* A positive work environment with a strong focus on innovation and customer excellence.
* You will be working with many of the latest technology trends within Business process management (BPM), primarily within Pega and be surrounded by skilled colleagues. At Capgemini, you will be part of a global organization with high client focus, collaborative culture, and an opportunity for continuous learning and development.
* Our Pega development team in Stockholm consists of +40 colleagues who are delivering projects to our clients, taking end-to-end responsibility to ensure that the right architecture and solution is implemented.
* We are the largest Pega practice in the Nordics and Capgemini has experience from multiple successful implementations in the Nordic market.
* The Nordics are the #1 in Capgemini Europe and we will continue to build on our success


**In general**
* Exciting career opportunities locally and internationally, and fantastic networks of expertise. With over 4000 colleagues in Sweden only, you are part of a sharp, technology and business focused community, where Coursera and more than 250 000 (!) courses and certifications are offered to all employees.
* A variety of innovative projects with well-known clients and world-leading partners – being part of a global, long-standing, successful and rapidly expanding organization.
* An inclusive corporate culture where Diversity is our most important guiding principle. We are continuously engaged in initiatives that promote diversity and women in tech; we run LGBTQ networks and aim for inclusion in all types of staff activities – from sports club to art association. Please find out more about Capgemini as an employer HERE.
* All employees are covered by a collective agreement and receive occupational pension, insurance, parental benefits and health care allowance – among other best-in-class benefits.


**In Recent Employee Surveys, Our Employees Particularly Emphasized**
* A friendly and flexible workplace culture
* Supportive managers and freedom of speech
* Strong values and diversity focus
* Good work-life balance


**Our Values**
* Honesty, Boldness, Trust, Freedom, Team spirit, Modesty and Fun


**About Capgemini**
 Capgemini is a global business and technology transformation partner, helping organizations to accelerate their dual transition to a digital and sustainable world, while creating tangible impact for enterprises and society. It is a responsible and diverse group of 340,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong over 55-year heritage, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to unlock the value of technology to address the entire breadth of their business needs. It delivers end-to-end services and solutions leveraging strengths from strategy and design to engineering, all fueled by its market leading capabilities in AI, cloud and data, combined with its deep industry expertise and partner ecosystem. The Group reported 2023 global revenues of €22.5 billion.
   

  

 Get The Future You Want | www.capgemini.com

title: Marketing Operations Manager
description:
At Billogram we like to be the good guys of billing, making money when clients are happy and pay on time rather than from missed payments. We believe it always pays off to treat people well. That’s why our platform for invoices and payments is built to remove pain and instead be of gain to both our clients and their customers – improving their relations.
   

  

 To ensure continuous growth and become a leader in the European consumer billing market we are looking for a Marketing Operations Manager to join our marketing team.
   

  

 About the role:
   

  

 As Marketing Operations Manager at Billogram, you will play a crucial role in streamlining our marketing efforts, from managing lead processes to optimizing campaign performance. You will be responsible for aligning and streamlining marketing and sales processes, overseeing key metrics, and enhancing our marketing automation systems to drive efficiency and achieve business goals.
   

  

 Primary responsibilities:
   

  

**Marketing Operations**
* Lead and Process Management: Oversee the lead management process, ensuring accurate tracking, nurturing, and handoff between teams, while also designing and refining workflows to align marketing, sales, and BDR activities.
* Performance Metrics: Develop and manage KPIs and dashboards to provide insights and support data-driven decision-making.
* Pardot Ownership: Manage and optimize Pardot, including automation setup, streamline marketing workflows, such as using automation rules, lead scoring, and engagement studio to nurture leads. Audience segmentation is key, and behavior-based rules to deliver personalized content as well as user training. Also, design and optimize automated email campaigns, manage forms and landing pages, and ensure seamless integration with CRM and marketing systems.


**Performance Marketing**
* Campaign and Process Management: Plan, execute, and optimize marketing campaigns, ensuring efficiency, scalability and alignment with business goals.
* Conversion Optimization: Analyze and improve conversion rates, focusing on maximizing ROI and lead quality.


 What we are looking for:
   

  

 As a person, you are solution-oriented, quickly adapting to new challenges and effectively solving problems as they arise. You approach work methodically, ensuring that processes are efficient and well-organized. You are communicative and skilled at building relationships across all organizational levels and enjoy bringing people together to achieve common goals. Lastly, you are confident, consistently taking initiatives and making informed decisions that drive progress.
   

  

 Skills & qualifications:
   

  

* Minimum of 3 years of relevant experience in a similar role, such as Marketing Operations Manager (B2B), or as a consultant, with Salesforce experience required and Pardot experience considered a plus.
* Proficiency in marketing automation, with demonstrated experience in streamlining processes, managing campaigns, scaling operations, and optimizing tactics through A/B testing.
* Proven experience in setting up dashboards and creating dynamic marketing operations programs.
* Strong data analysis skills, focusing on measuring campaign effectiveness and optimizing strategies for data-driven decisions.
* Expertise in project management, including the coordination of campaigns, time-management, and ensuring successful execution.
* Previous experience in the SaaS industry is a plus.
* A university degree in a relevant field is an advantage.
* Fluency in English, both written and verbal, is required, along with professional working proficiency in Swedish. Fluency in additional languages such as German is a plus.


 Why work with us?
   

  

 At Billogram we promise you an exciting journey as we break into new markets and grow at a rapid pace. That aside you will get lots of freedom and opportunity to develop together with great colleagues at our office, right in the center of Stockholm. We also offer flexible working hours, exciting challenges and a whole lot of laughs.
   

  

 We're committed to your long-term development, offering clear career progression paths. You'll also enjoy a fantastic benefits package, including 30 (+2) days of holiday, an occupational pension, a flexible wellness allowance, sick leave top-up, and parental leave compensation. At Billogram, our inclusive and diverse culture ensures that everyone can enjoy a fulfilling career and a great work-life balance.
   

  

 At Billogram, we provide equal opportunities and strive for an inclusive and diverse environment. All applicants will be considered for employment without attention to gender, transgender identity or expression, ethnicity, religion or other beliefs, disability, sexual orientation, or age.
   

  

 Welcome to the world of Billogram!

title: Account Executive, High Tech & Telco Providers
job_function: Sales, Business Development, and Information Technology
company_industry: IT Services and IT Consulting, Information Services, and Research Services
description:
**Why You Should Apply**
* You will deliver objective, actionable insights to CEOs, CMOs and Chief Product Officers and their teams within High Tech and Telco Providers in Sweden.
* You will join a high-performing, global company that is seeing double-digit growth for 40+ consecutive quarters.
* You will work in a highly collaborative sales environment with excellent career growth opportunities – 95% of our leadership positions were hired internally.


**Position Summary**
 For our office in Solna, we’re looking for an Account Executive to partner with new and existing clients within High Tech and Telco Providers.
   

  

 As an experienced sales professional, you will address your clients’ most critical priorities, primarily their go-to-market and growth strategy. You will identify opportunities for account retention and growth through contract expansion, introducing new services and products. This is a field-based role, selling directly to Large Enterprise clients; organisations with $250M+ in annual revenue, which includes 77% of the Global F500.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Quota of approximately $1M in contract value across 5-10 large enterprise accounts.
* Build trust-based, value-added relationships with C-level executives and their teams, primarily the CEO and CMO/CPO office.
* Drive account retention and growth by impacting their most critical priorities and demonstrate Gartner’s value.
* Drive new business with new logos, through networking, events and your own prospecting.
* Utilise industry knowledge of your specific market segment, stay up to date with trends to ensure an effective go to market approach.
* Collaborate across teams, regions and departments, sharing best practice, to ensure a best-in-class approach to strategic initiatives and growth plans.
* Support the business in improving diversity, developing fellow associates, and growing the team within an inclusive environment.


**Requirements**
* 5+ years of relevant sales experience, of which at least 2 years in a tech/IT environment. Direct sales experience within a vendor, service provider, telecommunications company, consulting, or a similar environment is highly relevant for this role.
* Experience selling to senior business leaders, preferably the CEO, CMO or Product Manager.
* A track record of consistent (over)achievement on your goals and targets.
* Bachelor’s or Master’s degree is desirable.
* Fluency in Swedish and English.
* Experience using Challenger Sales or a similar sales method is a plus.


**What Gartner Gives You**
* Uncapped earnings and challenging and achievable quotas – 85% of our salesforce hit quota, unlocking accelerators every year
* An all-expenses paid "Winners Circle" trip for top performers; every year, 40-50% of sales associates qualify for this
* Best-in-class training, including an intensive 2-week sales expedition for new hires and continuous support after that
* Growth opportunities: our business is seeing double-digit growth, providing plenty of internal career development opportunities.
* Excellent corporate benefits.
* Collaborative, team-oriented culture that embraces diversity, equity, and inclusion, to empower each associate to be their authentic and best self.
* Virtual first policy, giving the chance to combine working from office and home
* The opportunity to work with Global 500 and sell at C-level and work with some of the brightest minds in the industry and help them to build the successful organisations of tomorrow


**Who are we?**
 At Gartner, Inc. (NYSE:IT), we guide the leaders who shape the world.
   

  

 Our mission relies on expert analysis and bold ideas to deliver actionable, objective insight, helping enterprise leaders and their teams succeed with their mission-critical priorities.
   

  

 Since our founding in 1979, we’ve grown to more than 20,000 associates globally who support ~15,000 client enterprises in ~90 countries and territories. We do important, interesting and substantive work that matters. That’s why we hire associates with the intellectual curiosity, energy and drive to want to make a difference. The bar is unapologetically high. So is the impact you can have here.
   

  

**What makes Gartner a great place to work?**
 Our sustained success creates limitless opportunities for you to grow professionally and flourish personally. We have a vast, virtually untapped market potential ahead of us, providing you with an exciting trajectory long into the future. How far you go is driven by your passion and performance.
   

  

 We hire remarkable people who collaborate and win as a team. Together, our singular, unifying goal is to deliver results for our clients.
   

  

 Our teams are inclusive and composed of individuals from different geographies, cultures, religions, ethnicities, races, genders, sexual orientations, abilities and generations.
   

  

 We invest in great leaders who bring out the best in you and the company, enabling us to multiply our impact and results. This is why, year after year, we are recognized worldwide as a great place to work.
   

  

**What do we offer?**
 Gartner offers world-class benefits, highly competitive compensation and disproportionate rewards for top performers.
   

  

 In our hybrid work environment, we provide the flexibility and support for you to thrive — working virtually when it's productive to do so and getting together with colleagues in a vibrant community that is purposeful, engaging and inspiring.
   

  

 Ready to grow your career with Gartner? Join us.
   

  

 The policy of Gartner is to provide equal employment opportunities to all applicants and employees without regard to race, color, creed, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, marital status, citizenship status, age, national origin, ancestry, disability, veteran status, or any other legally protected status and to affirmatively seek to advance the principles of equal employment opportunity.
